*div1 type="summary"* *p*Jesse H. Cartwright to Austin, June 5, 1825. The case of the schooner Mary. Commerce.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*HarrisBurgh */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="06-05-1825">June 5-1825*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Col Steven F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Dear Sir I am informed that *person_mentioned*Capt Carrico */person_mentioned*has taken a part of a bail of Domestick from *location_mentioned*on board of the Schooner*/location_mentioned* wrapt in his Bed and a part of it in his trunk Say about 300 yds also has taken the long Boat *location_mentioned*on shore*/location_mentioned* and top Sail which was all under execution I am informd the *person_mentioned*guard */person_mentioned*dont know of the domestick being gone and before the trial they Sent off 5 barrels of flower and one of whiskey this will show to you that they are making way with their property to avoid the payment of their just debts and I wish to decide as quick as possible and if you confirm the judgment I wish you to order the *person_mentioned*Captains */person_mentioned*to be brought forward under execution and hired out to pay the balance of the debt and cost of them should there be a Balance as I find that to be the law I find it impossible to get a *person_mentioned*guard */person_mentioned*to doo their duty as they dont [like?]it they wont do as they are directed we are all kept here litterally speaking in a State of starvation without Bread and waiting to get our rights, I came to cultivate the Soil and the Season is fast expiring that we can be benefited by it,—this will be handed you by a *person_mentioned*coloured man */person_mentioned*which was *person_mentioned*Steward */person_mentioned**location_mentioned*on board of the Schooner */location_mentioned*and you can ask him about what I have stated.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Jesse H. Cartwright*/person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p* *p*P S there is one Barrel of flower *location_mentioned*on board */location_mentioned*and we intend to make use of it—*/p*
*p*Please to send me an answer by the first opportunity and oblige yours*/p*
*/div1*
